page.title: 10Life Styles.
page.content: The life style in Ashington varies a lot in fashion.Most people wear what they want then other people follow them and most clothes become very common.Some people wear very unusual clothes such as tartan pant's with studs,and a very glamerous hairstyle to match. Another way of following friends is by popstars.Some bands are very common and have millions of fans just in Britain.Concerts are attended and lots of songs are sung.Now you can even buy T-shirts or join their fan clubs. Evenings become a bit boring if you are just watching television so most people go out to clubs or old people tend to go gambling at the local bingo.
